overview:
• One of the most successful entrepreneurs in India, leading a Non-Banking Financial Institution engaged in financing of infrastructure projects and equipment having international Stakeholders.
    • He is a Fellowship of Chartered Accountancy (FCA) from the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India.

Achievements

* Strong domain knowledge of Strategic business
* Has been instrumental in taking the SREI Group and Quippo, to a leadership position in the country
* Held important positions such as Past President of Hire Purchase & Leading Association, Kolkata and Merchants&#8217; Chamber of Commerce, Kolkata
* At present, on the managing committees of All India institution like CIDC, Assocham, FIDC, CTTI, etc.
* Active member of the working group on Construction for the Tenth Five Year Plan (2002-2007) Planning Commission, Government of India.
* Also a Member of working group on construction for the 11th five year plan.
